duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-level support that aligns with the firm's standards and requirements.
Assist in technical administration tasks, including managing Active Directory groups and user account maintenance.
Offer support for computer hardware and software-related issues.
Maintain an inventory of computer hardware assets.
Perform system setups, breakdowns, and office relocations.
Manage conference room services, including video conferencing, AV setups, and takedowns.
Support mobile device operations, with a focus on enterprise email delivery.
Provide assistance for telephone and voicemail systems.
Track and document user support requests and system failures.
Escalate complex issues to advanced support teams, ensuring effective follow-up and user communication.
Proactively engage with the Helpdesk and local users to identify unreported or recurring problems.
Perform routine maintenance and implement preventative measures.
Coordinate the procurement of various technology supplies.
Communicate highly technical information in easily understandable, non-technical terms.
Participate in on-call rotation and be available for overtime as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field
